step_feedback.feedback: Great job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Focus on making the motion a smooth circle.
You're doing well with the circular motion. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer to your body as you roll your shoulders.
Excellent! You completed the repetitions. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Keep squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to breathe deeply as you move to help with oxygen flow.
